Text: I don't know why it shows 0 seeders and 0 leechers. Presently there are 24 seeds and 122 leechers, and I'm still seeding as well at maximum bandwidth.

TPB tracks the seed-leech count from openbittorrent tracker (automatically includes in torrent file when you upload) which often goes down. The seedcount on the client (like uTorrent) is nearly correct as it shows the highest count from all the trackers included. This torrent is well seeded already.

Keep up good work whitecat :)
